#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <string>
#include <set>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdio>
#include <queue>
 
using namespace std;
int primes[50000];
int nextPrime[50000];
int main() {
	/*freopen("t.in", "r", stdin);
	freopen("t.out", "w", stdout);*/

	int t,n,i;
	primes[0] = 1;
	primes[1] = 1;
	for(int i = 2 ; i*i <= 50000; ++i)
		for(int j = 2; i*j < 50000; ++j)
			primes[i*j] = 1;

	nextPrime[46021] = 46027;
	for(int i = 46020; i >= 1; --i)
		if(primes[i + 1] == 0)
			nextPrime[i] = i+1;
		else
			nextPrime[i] = nextPrime[i+1];
	
	scanf("%d", &t);

	while(t)
	{
		scanf("%d", &n);
		long long s = nextPrime[n]*nextPrime[nextPrime[n]];
		printf("%I64d\n", s);

		t--;
	}
	
    return 0;
}
